verses.verse: <S%H7200>"See,<s%> I have <S%H7121>called<s%> by <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1212>Bezalel,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H221>Uri,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2354>Hur,<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

"And I have <S%H4390>filled<s%> him with the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> in <S%H8394>understanding,<s%> in <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> [kinds of] <S%H4399>craftsmanship,<s%>
to <S%H2803>make<s%> artistic <S%H4284>designs<s%> for <S%H6213>work<s%> in <S%H2091>gold,<s%> in <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and in <S%H5178>bronze,<s%>

and in the <S%H2799>cutting<s%> of <S%H68>stones<s%> for <S%H4390>settings,<s%> and in the <S%H2799>carving<s%> of <S%H6086>wood,<s%> that he may <S%H6213>work<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> [kinds of] <S%H4399>craftsmanship.<s%>

"And <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I <S%H589>Myself<s%> have <S%H5414>appointed<s%> with him <S%H171>Oholiab,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H294>Ahisamach,<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan;<s%> and in the <S%H3820>hearts<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2450>who<s%> are <S%H2450>skillful<s%> <S%H3820><s%> I have <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H2451>skill,<s%> that they may <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you:

the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> and the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> and the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> <S%H3727>seat<s%> upon it, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>furniture<s%> of the <S%H168>tent,<s%>

the <S%H7979>table<s%> also and its <S%H3627>utensils,<s%> and the <S%H2889>pure<s%> [gold] <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H3627>utensils,<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H7004>incense,<s%>
the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> also with <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H3627>utensils,<s%> and the <S%H3595>laver<s%> and its <S%H3653>stand,<s%>

the <S%H8278>woven<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> as well, and the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and the <S%H899>garments<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> [with which] to <S%H3547>carry<s%> on their <S%H3547>priesthood;<s%>

the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> also, and the <S%H5561>fragrant<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> for the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, they are to <S%H6213>make<s%> [them] according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you. "

"But as for you, <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'You shall <S%H389>surely<s%> <S%H8104>observe<s%> My <S%H7676>sabbaths;<s%> for [this] is a <S%H226>sign<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> Me and you throughout your <S%H1755>generations,<s%> that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> who <S%H6942>sanctifies<s%> you.

'Therefore you are to <S%H8104>observe<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath,<s%> for it is <S%H6944>holy<s%> to you. Everyone who <S%H2490>profanes<s%> it shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death;<s%> for <S%H3605>whoever<s%> <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> on it, that <S%H5315>person<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> his <S%H9415>people.<s%>

'For <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> may be <S%H6213>done,<s%> but on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> there is a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of <S%H7677>complete<s%> <S%H7677>rest,<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> <S%H3605>whoever<s%> <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

'So the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath,<s%> to <S%H6213>celebrate<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> throughout their <S%H1755>generations<s%> as a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>'

"It is a <S%H226>sign<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> Me and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5769>forever;<s%> for in <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth,<s%> but on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> He <S%H7673>ceased<s%> [from labor,] and was <S%H5314>refreshed.<s%>"

And when He had <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> with him upon <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> He <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> of <S%H68>stone,<s%> <S%H3789>written<s%> by the <S%H676>finger<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>
